eu.amidst.core.utils

Class ArrayVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.utils.ArrayVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, SufficientStatistics, Vector

    public class ArrayVector
extends java.lang.Object
implements MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, SufficientStatistics
    This class implements the interfaces MomentParameters, NaturalParameters, and SufficientStatistics. It handles some array vector utility methods.
